pgrid.core.maintenance.identity
Class NoMaintenancePolicy

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.maintenance.identity.NoMaintenancePolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
JoinLeaveProtocol, MaintenancePolicy
public class NoMaintenancePolicy
extends Object
implements MaintenancePolicy, JoinLeaveProtocol

This class is a place holder. It does nothing for the maintenance or the leave - join protocol.

Author:
Renault John

Description copied from interface: MaintenancePolicy
